Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service and Staff”
Reviews.Author: BlueBird103
Reviews.Content: Me and my partner visited Amsterdam for the first time and stayed at the Crown Plaza South. We both had a very pleasent stay and the staff was outstanding. The hotel atmosphere was very peaceful and fresh. The gentleman on reception was very welcoming and printed off the transportation information to city centre. The room was lovely, the added amenities in the room such as the lavender linen spray, complimentary spring water, slippers and robe was a nice touch. The bed was so comfortable and felt very rested. Breakfast at the One o One Restaurant was very delicious and filling. The Manhattan Lounge was also very nice. Me and my partner really appreciated the late check-out the last day, as I was was not feeling my best and gave me extra time to rest. The house keeper even gave me an extra bottle of water to make me feel better. Even though the hotel was located out of city centre the transportation was quick, and only within 5min walk from the hotel to the trams. A hotel is only as good as there staff. Well done to the team at Crown Plaza. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Amsterdam.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: GuyHadar
Reviews.Content: The Crowne Plaza Amsterdam South is a great hotel in a not so bad location. Thaw it situated rather far from the center, it shouldnâ€™t worry you, since there is an efficient transportation in to the city center. You can take tram no. 5 or the metro and within 10-20 minutes you will be were its all happening. 7 minutes train from Schiphol, you will get a comfy bad in a beautiful decorated room, you will get the friendliest stuff that will go off his way to help you around and great and not so expensive f & b. I stayed in this hotel for an all week and loved every minute of it. Thank you all in CP Amsterdam South for a beautiful Dutch holiday!!!

Reviews.Title: “One of the Best.”
Reviews.Author: rarity1ca
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Crowne Plaza Amsterdam Southe for 2 nights after Christmas 2011 and the staff was phenomenal extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms were really nice and very clean. It is a bit from Central Amsterdam but the train is only a block away and we were in the city centre within 10 minutes. Thought this was one of the nicest Crowne Plazas I have stayed in.

Reviews.Title: “Good conference hotel”
Reviews.Author: ashlessinseattle
Reviews.Content: I use ICHotels a lot and have to say that the Crowne Plaza brand has become very mixed with widely varying quality depending on where you stay. This Crowne Plaza, however, is probably the best I have stayed at. Very good rooms and very quiet, even though the hotel was quite full because of a business convention. Staff are excellent and the bar and restaurant food was quite good (try the suckling pig if it's on the menu). You may find yourself using one or both of the bar/restaurant as, like others have said, this hotel is out in the financial district and there doesn't appear to be much in the vicinity. It is a plus that the hotel is near the RAI and the airport but I can see that if you were visiting Amsterdam for sightseeing, you would want to get this hotel at a very good rate in order to allow for the need to travel into the city. Overall, if you need a hotel that is near the RAI, I think this one will fit the bill. If you are sightseeing, stay closer to the city unless you can get a really good rate at this one.

Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel”
Reviews.Author: Erannn
Reviews.Content: New hotel. Very pleasant , room are well appointed , spacey and have in them everything you may need. Location isn't good for sight seeing (15 min taxi to Center Amsterdam ). Very good location for attending an exhibition at RAI conf Center. Not much going around the hotel at night time. 6 min train ride from airport.

Reviews.Title: “Credit card fraud”
Reviews.Author: Leelee38103
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel over the New Year (12/30/11 thru 1/1/12). While the hotel itself was very nice, I have had EXTENSIVE, ONGOING problems with fraudulent credit card charges from the hotel. I reserved and paid for the hotel using a third party (Hotwire). Upon arrival, I was asked to put down a credit card for incidentals. Because they wouldn't take any of my American credit cards except for my Visa debit card, I had to use that. The only incidental I should have been charged for was a bottle of water from the minibar. A few days later, the hotel charged my debit card for almost $2,000. I spent about $30 on several international phone calls attempting to get the money refunded by the hotel. It took about 10 days, but it was finally resolved. They shorted me about $50 on changes in the exchange rate, but I just gave up at that point. I was given no explanation for what had happened other than it was a "computer problem" and no one ever apologized or even seemed concerned. It was frustrating, but mistakes happen. However, yesterday I was charged another $600 by this hotel. It has been almost 2 months since my stay. I am reporting this charge as fraudulent and canceling my credit card. There is absolutely no reason a hotel should be fraudulently charging customers two months after their stay, computer problem or not. Other things to note - the hotel seemed very clean. However, the mini bar refrigerator in our room had several leftover items in it from previous guests (half empty water bottles, coffee mugs filled with some type of liquid). Also, the location is in the middle of nowhere and none of the businesses surrounding it were open on the weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Good Quality Business Accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Mark S
Reviews.Content: I was booked into here as there was a shortage of accommodation in my usual AMS hotel. It has a great location in the business district. The staff were really helpful and the price was reasonable. The best feature was the room which was really comfortable and appointed. I found it easy to relax and do more work from it. Good gym also.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Good location”
Reviews.Author: topgun20
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed 4 nights at hotel. Hotel is comfortable and staff are friendly. Hotel is set in a new commercial complex but is still accessible to Amsterdam city. A breeze to get to from Schipol airport - 1 stop (15 min) as well as easy access to Amsterdam city by tram number 5. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience overall!”
Reviews.Author: YehaviKl
Reviews.Content: Became my second home there in amsterdam, a safe relaible place! So close to everything through the substation a few meters away, pretty perfect, been all over amsterdam and I wish I would return:-) Zuid station

Reviews.Title: “It s kind of ok”
Reviews.Author: alecu2k
Reviews.Content: The only problem is that is kind of far away from the city.The staff was kind and helpfull though.I wouldn t reccomend it as a first choice because of the placement

Reviews.Title: “just what the doctor ordered”
Reviews.Author: dieselandcassie07
Reviews.Content: Just came back from a four night stay and the hotel is lovely and the staff are more then willing to help on places to go and cheaper ways to get out and about..The hotel was about a 15 minute tram ride (tram 5) to the square 7 euros for a 24 hour ticket the tram stop is just a five minute walk from hotel also there is a little supermarket petrol station and train station with in this five minute walk tip if your thinking of staying here and dont have the 40 euros to pay for a taxi to and from airport get the train 3 euro and drops you in the airport..i dont have anything bad to say apart from all the white bits from the towels so take a lint roller also no information in rooms about local things to do room service menu wasnt great to me room service is like pizzas and chicken burger and chips fudge cake ice cream. the mini bar in the room has room for your own bits like milk juice etc.all in all we had a great time dont be put off by the 15minute distance to the square plenty of trams and the peace and quite might be a blessing after a night in dam square.... the place where no one judges you Be back soon M

Reviews.Title: “nice and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: kincorth
Reviews.Content: I found this hotel very quiet and comfortable with good food and friendly staff. i sincerely hope they can contain this level of service as the hotel matures. On bad point is the car parking charges 41 Euros to park overnight is extortionate.

Reviews.Title: “Most things are great, some services need improvement”
Reviews.Author: JacquesRavoo
Reviews.Content: This hotel has recently opened. Located in the south, the business center of Amsterdam. Easily reachable by car and public transport. The rooms are very nice. Excellent sleeping quality,large bathroom. Some things were missing but they are working on it. A guest directory, writing paper and a pen was missing. The service in the bar is great. Nice staff with a good knowledge of the hotel, area and food & beverages for sale at the bar. Also the Manager on Duty was very kind. Breakfast staff is very friendly. Eggs were made fresh by the kitchen staff upon request. Truly great. Service at the front desk needs improvement. Not well known in the area. We were going to a restaurant close by but they didn't know the location. The Manager on Duty helped us out. The strange thing was when I returned home and I noticed I forgot some medicine. As I needed the box I called the hotel and found out they located the box. When I requested it to be sent they weren't ready for it as there was no procedure for it yet and they didn't have any boxes to sent it in. The next day I travelled by car to pick it up. So this part of the hotel service needs definitely improvement.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful experience.”
Reviews.Author: javiercarrion
Reviews.Content: We have been staying with our son, and experience has been wonderful. The hotel staff warm, friendly and very professional. Being new site, you premiering all things. Transport very fast, it takes about 15 minutes to reach the center. The restaurant service of hihg quality and good prices. In short, celebrating our silver wedding had a good climax. From Toledo (Spain) I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “A good experience”
Reviews.Author: gsabbatino
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel during a work meeting. The hotel was opened only few days before so somethings was not ready or, I'll say "not yet available", like the breakfast selection was improving from day to day. It is located near the WTC just at walking distance. I found the hotel room very comfortable, modern and clean. The shower is in the bath, protected by a glass window, the furniture are really good. Minibar selection was quite good, but a bit expensive. The general looknof hehotel is reaaly nice, in front of a small water channel filled with birds... People at the reception were nice . i found this experience a good discovery. I'll come back for sure, next time I'll come in Amsterdam.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, it's worth a try (and they keep working to improve)”
Reviews.Author: JojoRM
Reviews.Content: A very good experience at the Crowne Plaza Amsterdam South, and, if you are a customer of Crowne Plaza, you will get the same taste. My feeling was that, being opened (officially) from days when I checked in, a few things had to be tuned. At the check in, at 2.20 pm, my room was not ready; I understand that the check-in time was at 3.00pm, but the hotel was not so crowded, in any case; anyway, after having a sandwich at the bar (very good sandwich) I was rewarded with a nice room, overlooking the small channel at the side of the hotel, with a terrace - unlickily I could not enjoy because of the weather. The morning after, I wanted an omelette for breakfast, but there was no ham or cheese to feed into it, but the morning after, both were available! So, good staying, in the end, staff members are very nice, friendly, and do whatever they can to make you feel welcome. Room is more than comfortable, very quite, no noise at all I will definitely go back soon, I'm recommending it, no doubt

HotelInfo.Name: Crowne Plaza Amsterdam South
HotelInfo.Address: George Gershwinlaan 101, Amsterdam 1082, The Netherlands
